articles.description: Kelly, 55, was found guilty on three counts of child pornography but was acquitted of a conspiracy to obstruct justice. He was convicted by a New York jury of sex trafficking in June.

articles.title: Prince William will claim £1million a year from Cornwall's dead thanks to medieval law - Cornwall Live
articles.description: Prince William's total annual income from the Duchy of Cornwall is likely to be more than £20m

articles.title: Queen 'knew she wasn't going to return from Balmoral', royal expert says - Daily Record
articles.description: Katie Nicholl, Vanity Fair's royal correspondent, believes the monarch wanted to spend her final days at Aberdeenshire estate, as opposed to Buckingham Palace or Windsor Castle.
